main event: A visual sighting of a dome-shaped metallic object hovering and moving laterally and vertically at Chanute AFB.
interesting points: The object was initially reported to coincide with a loud noise thought to be from a satellite., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., The object changed colors due to atmospheric refraction., It was described as being one fifth the size of the sun., Observers included reliable personnel from the Air Force.
witness description: Capt T.E. Wood and L. Rinehart from the Air Police Squadron, considered reliable.
